label: Model
info:
The Model of a MVC architecture

* Gets XBee Transmission from XBee RX node
    * Add 16 bit to memory
* Re-format dataframe for simple MQTT transition
* Send to MQTT
* Get from MQTT
* Transfrom JSON String back into Javascript Object
* Sort the message's source to the matching player
* Sent to Player's MQTT
* Get From Player MQTT (note that topic stays unchanged unless explicitly changed)
    * Eg MQTT: 'Player/P1' will stay that until changed at the end
* Transfrom JSON String back into Javascript Object
* Sort message type : Data or Request
    * Request types need reply
    * Data types update existing data
* If its a Request:
    * Sort if its a User Validation or Magazine Request 
    * Save gun addr and query database
    * Update data and send to Dashboard via MQTT
    * Reply to Xbee
* If it is Data:
    * Sort Data types {B:Bullet data, G:GPS,I:IMU}
    * Process data
    * Send updates to Dashboard via MQTT

Also process user interaction with Dashboard like the profile view, timer and the logout

Profile:
    Get P1|P2|P3|P4 from Profile MQTT
    Find user id
    Query DB
    Update Dashboard via MQTT

Time Logging
    Calculate time between clicks
    Query Results DB for player stats
    Get existing gametime from DB
    Add old time + this.time
    Update DB
    Clear session data (Bullets fired, speed, etc but not players)

Log everyone Out:
    Force Clear
        Reset Player list, session data, everything

label: View
info:
The View of a MVC Architecture

 * Specialised MQTT subscribe outputs data to UI with minimal processing
 * Map is imported as a iframe from localhost:PORT/worldmap
 * Buttons to change from Single to ALL views
 *

label: Bullet Dash Gen + Map
info:
Contains:
    Shooter profiles and automator
    Bullet counters
    CSS changer
    Map /worldmap
    Show/Hide profiles

format:
<iframe 
    id='frame'
    src='/worldmap'
    width='100%'

>
</iframe>

<script>
 window.setInterval("reloadIFrame();", 3000);
 function reloadIFrame() {
  document.frames["frame"].location.reload();
 }
</script>

update doc

GUN CODES
info:
R = REQUEST
    M = MAGAZINE
    U = USER
D = DATA
    A = AMMO (shots fired)
    B = BULLET (speed of bullet)
    G = GPS
    
EX:
    RUAAA
        request user suthentication, rfid 'AAA'
        
    RM001
        request magazine capacity, rfid '001'
    
    DA2
        data message: 2 shots fired
    
    DB7000
        data message: bullet time is 7000us
        
    DG123,123,123
        data message: GPS coords: 123,123,123 :: Lat, Lon, Alt
    
    Combined:
    DA1B7000
        data message: 1 shot fired at 7000us
REPLIES:
    to gun authentication
        <Boolean><Name:5>  
            <boolean> = 0 if user not found
                      = 1 if user is found
            <name>    = username of the user in 5 characters or less
    to magazine request
        r<size>
            r         = to denote reply message
            <size>    = size of magazine on record
    Examples:
        Mag :  r12
            Reply, magazine size 12
        User:  0fail
            User not found
               1Jhett
            User Found: Name = Jhett
